name: Verify Remove Button and Other Links
description:
As a user of the JPetStore application,
  I want to be able to add items to my cart and verify the cart page,
  So that I can ensure that the cart displays the correct items and information.
descriptionHtml:
As a user of the JPetStore application,
I want to be able to add items to my cart and verify the cart page,
So that I can ensure that the cart displays the correct items and information.

testStage.description:
As a user of the JPetStore application,
  I want to be able to add items to my cart and verify the cart page,
  So that I can ensure that the cart displays the correct items and information.

steps.name: Given I am on the "Welcome" page
Given I click on the "Enter The Store Link"
Given I am on the "Catalog" page
When I click on the "Birds" in the main image section
Then I am on the "Category" page
When I click on the product "AV-CB-01"
Then I am on the "Product" page
When I click on the item link for item ID "EST-18"
Then I am on the "Item" page
When I click on the "Add To Cart Button"
Then I am on the "Cart" page
And The href value of the remove button for item ID "EST-18" should match the expected value "https://petstore.octoperf.com/actions/Cart.action?removeItemFromCart=&workingItemId=EST-18"
And The "href" value of the element should match the expected value:

labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify Remove Button and Other Links

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Verify Remove Button and Other Links
